item.description:
Second Tuesday in May, we will return to the Trident Cafe for another informal networking and discussion about the Digital Arts. This will be a chance to welcome new members and show what the group is about. We'll also talk about events you would like to see in the future. Looking forward to another great discussion about art and technology!

Members old and new are welcome to attend.

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Digital Arts Meetup: New Member Welcome @ the Trident
